channel.title: Latest PHMSA Hazardous Materials Incident Reports, for IL

  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: The cap loosened and caused the contents to spill out and leaked in the box that lead to the box breaking. DescribePack: the caps weren't tightened correctly DurationRel: 1 and MitigateEffect: we moved the hazardus material to our hazmat cage away from being able to harm anyone and put the contents in a drum so it didn't get all over while we wait to process this report.

item.description:
Report X-2023120834

Identified by scraper @ 2024-01-04T15:11:20+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-12-12
  • City: WHEELING
  • State: IL
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: Package was found when unloading a van. Package was wet and leaking. Package was removed from operation area and taken to Hazmat Cage for processing. Any spill was cleaned up and materials used were brought to Hazmat cage. DescribePack: loose caps and seals on inner bottles DurationRel: 1 and MitigateEffect: As soon as package was discovered leaking it was removed from the area and taken to Hazmat cage

  • Description: LOADER NOTICED WET SPOT FROM PACKAGE. CALLED FOR SUPERVISOR. SUPERVISOR CALLED FOR DESIGNATED RESPONDER. DESIGNATED RESPONDER ARRIVED AT SCENE WITH PROPER EQUIPMENT ON AND SPILL CART AND DECISION TREE. DESIGNATED RESPONDER RESPONDED PROPERLY TO THE PACKAGE WITH NO TROUBLES.

item.title: Report X-2023120795
item.description:
Report X-2023120795

Identified by scraper @ 2024-01-03T15:12:34+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-11-29
  • City: ROCKFORD
  • State: IL
  • Report Type: Undeclared Shipment with no Release
  • Mode Of Transportation: Air
  • Carrier/Reporter: FEDERAL EXPRESS CORPORATION
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: large non UN spec fibreboard box broke open during sorting to reveal Undeclared UN1197 in plastic jerrican. very poor inner packing. no relase. secured in salvage drum pending FAA inspection. .
